title: Can someone teach me how to play Kalista...?
body:
Specifically her laning. I'm trying to learn her but every time I play her I literally feed endlessly, lol...

But then I see Kalista mains that like win almost every game and I'm like "wow I wanna be like you" and then I get really sad?

replies.body: Use move attack "A" instead of clicking, will be much easier.

Playing kalista will teach you how to kite,since she's the easiest to do so with and that was the intention of her passive.
Try to max Q and not E like all of those braindeads,Rush botrk
